column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I regret that we have extended wait times during peak periods. As far as weekends go
column2: we do get very busy especially before right before Astros and Rockets games. We have a large swath of area sports fans who enjoy getting ramen before or after the games. That said
column3: I appreciate your understanding. I must
column5: make a slight correction to your post to say that we do not take reservations. Our seating is strictly first-come first-served.
